CSS.question: What does CSS stand for?
Which property is used to change the text color in CSS?
What property is used to set the background color of an element in CSS?
Which CSS property is used for controlling the layout?
Which value is used in CSS to make an element completely invisible?
What does the 'float' property in CSS do?
options: Moves an element to the left or right, allowing content to flow around it
Moves an element up and down

CSS.question: Which CSS property is used to add shadows to elements?
What does the 'margin' property in CSS define?
options: The space between an element's border and content
The space between an element's border and the next element
The space between an element's padding and border

CSS.question: Which property in CSS is used for making text bold?
What does the CSS property 'opacity' do?
options: Controls the transparency of an element

CSS.question: Which CSS property is used to change the size of the text?
What does the CSS property 'border-radius' define?
options: The shape of the corners of an element

CSS.question: What is the purpose of the 'z-index' property in CSS?
options: Controls the transparency of an element
Defines the stacking order of elements
Controls the size of an element

CSS.question: Which property is used to change the font of an element in CSS?
What does the 'position: absolute' CSS property do?
options: Aligns the text to the center
Removes the element from the normal flow and positions it in relation to its closest positioned ancestor

CSS.question: What does the CSS 'transition' property do?
options: Changes the size of the element
Creates animated effects when changing CSS properties

CSS.question: Which CSS property is used for changing the space between letters in text?
What is the purpose of the 'box-sizing' property in CSS?
options: Defines the size of the element's box
Controls the visibility of an element
Defines how the width and height of an element are calculated
Adds a border to the element

CSS.question: Which property is used for adding a background image in CSS?
What does the 'display: inline-block' property do in CSS?
options: Displays elements as inline elements with block-level properties

The background color of an element

CSS.question: Which property is used to set the opacity of an element in CSS?

options: Adds decoration to text like underline, overline, or line-through

CSS.question: What does the 'transform' property do in CSS?

Applies a 3D transformation to an element
Rearranges the position of the elements

What is the purpose of the 'overflow' property in CSS?

Adds a border to the element

options: The appearance of the mouse cursor

options: Controls the visibility of the back side of an element

options: The number of columns in a grid container

options: Transforms text to uppercase or lowercase

options: Adds an outline around an element

options: A way to protect data within a function
A function that is defined inside another function
A way to create private variables

JS.question: What does 'typeof' operator do in JavaScript?
options: Checks if a variable is defined
Returns the type of a variable or expression
Checks if two values are equal
Converts a value to a string

What is the purpose of the 'this' keyword in JavaScript?

options: Applies a function to each element in an array and returns a new array
Returns the index of an element in an array

options: Stops the event from bubbling up the DOM tree
Prevents the default action of an event

JS.question: Which function is used to convert a JSON string to an object in JavaScript?

To pause the execution of a function until a promise is settled

To remove elements from an array
To sort the elements in an array

options: An array of an object's keys
The number of keys in an object
The first key of an object
The value of an object's keys

Checks if an element exists in an array

JS.question: What is the purpose of 'localStorage' in JavaScript?
options: To store data that has no expiration time
To store data on the server

JS.question: Which statement is used to stop the execution of a loop in JavaScript?

options: Returns the parsed integer from a string
Converts a number to a string
Rounds a number to the nearest integer
Returns the decimal part of a number

options: Moving declarations to the top of the scope
Moving code to the top of the file

JS.question: What does the 'Promise' object represent in JavaScript?

A function that returns a value

options: A numeric value representing 'Not a Number'

JS.question: What does 'null' represent in JavaScript?

Pauses the execution of a function
